projects.name: School Portal Management
projects.shortDescription: A School Management System for administrators, teachers, and students.
projects.fullDescription: This web-based school portal management system was developed as part of a group project of Web Technologies Course. I was responsible for implementing the principal's dashboard and features. The Project includes functionality such as student and teacher management, staff management, announcements, fund management, and communication. The dashboard provides key insights, including student performance tracking and employee overviews.
